remarks: Topology component of a subring algebra.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
statement:
srapart.a $e |- ( ph -> A = ( ( subringAlg ` W ) ` S ) ) $.
srapart.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ ( Base ` W ) ) $.
sratset $p |- ( ph -> ( TopSet ` W ) = ( TopSet ` A ) ) $.
